text: 1/Cannmeds 2019 talk by the amazing Dr. Dedi Meiri. Dedi was speaking on some of the 140+ #cannabinoids from #cannabis & potential applications to some genetic variants of #autism, #prostate , #colon, #melanoma, #leukemia & #breast #cancer.
